Title: Data reference standard on codes for current and past official names of countries, territories and geographic areas recognized by the Government of Canada
Description: This reference standard is intended to standardize the way countries, territories and geographic areas are described in datasets.

Title: Data reference standard on Canadian provinces and territories
Description: This reference standard is intended to standardize the way Canadian provinces and territories are described in datasets.

Title: Data reference standard on industry classification system
Description: This reference standard is intended to standardize the way industry classifications are described in datasets.

Title: Data reference standard on the business number
Description: This data reference standard is intended to ensure that departments and agencies use the business number (BN) as the standard identifier for all transactions between businesses and the Government of Canada (GC).
Data reference standard stewards: CRAInnovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED)
